summary: Implements a unified blockchain access layer for the JoinMarket client, offering concrete interfaces to Bitcoin Core (full and lightweight), Electrum wallets, and regtest nodes. The module abstracts RPC communication, fee estimation, address handling, transaction creation, broadcasting, and UTXO queries, allowing the rest of the application to interact with the Bitcoin network without coupling to a specific backend.
